metadata.name: 01, COLLEGAMENTI, 1994
metadata.description:
"01, COLLEGAMENTI" is my first computer drawing. I made it with Mac Draw in a Apple PowerBook 100 in 1994. I never sold it because there was no NFT back then, so how could I? Now it's a unique work that also appears in my Floating Studio. 
It was exhibited at Andrea Nuovo Home Gallery in Naples for the first time at my Solo Show "FloatingStudio/Collegamenti" on March 2022, (a show curated by Massimo Sgroi).
